subtitle: AI-Powered Karaoke
description:

AiOke uses advanced audio processing to reduce vocals in any song, creating instant karaoke tracks. Record your own vocals with professional effects and share your performances.

PRIVACY: All audio processing happens locally on your device. Your recordings stay private unless you choose to share them.

Compatible with iOS 15.0 and later. Works great with headphones or speakers.

app_review_information.notes: AiOke is a karaoke app that processes audio locally on the device. No internet connection required for core functionality. The app includes demo tracks for testing. All audio processing uses Apple's Core Audio frameworks.

marketing_assets.promotional_text: Create professional karaoke tracks instantly with AI-powered vocal reduction. Record, practice, and perfect your performances with studio-quality effects.
marketing_assets.promotional_keywords: AI karaoke, vocal removal, singing practice, music app, audio effects
